original_title: Heart of Broadway: The Ensemble Behind Broadway Cares/Equity Fights AIDS
overview: Heart of Broadway goes inside Broadway Cares/Equity Fights AIDS for an in-depth look at the organization and its key players. Since 1988, they have raised more than $195 million for essential services for people with AIDS and other critical illnesses.
title: Heart of Broadway: The Ensemble Behind Broadway Cares/Equity Fights AIDS
